## ğŸ§ª Gherkin Scenario Template

Use this for every task:

```gherkin
Feature: [Feature Name]
  As a [user/developer]
  I want to [goal]
  So that [reason]

  Scenario: [Scenario name]
    Given [initial state]
    When [action performed]
    Then [expected result]
